name: 19N Strategies SL
goal:
19N is a global, Barcelona based policy and public affairs firm that aims to help organizations from both the public and the private sector to achieve their goals by effectively participating in the public and institutional debate.

Based in Barcelona and specially focused on this ecosystem, 19N offers a unique in-house perspective with a multidisciplinary team with a wide experience in the regulatory challenges of technological disruption. Specialised in the sharing and platform economy in the areas of mobility, housing the and future of work.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Fraud prevention, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Future of work, mobility, platform economy, sharing economy, digital economy, tech and innovation.
